title: How did I start this project?
text: Many programmers spend a significant amount of time working in a seated position, and it's no secret that maintaining good posture can be challenging, especially during long coding sessions. This realization hit close to home, as I, too, faced posture-related issues while programming.

section.title: Face Recognition?
section.content: Sit Straight uses posture detection algortihm base on the facial location of the user.

section.title: Desktop App?
section.content: Desktop apps can be built easily with Electron.js!
